markets.name: Freegunj Market
markets.description: A bustling commercial hub for clothing, electronics, and local goods.

markets.name: Tower Chowk
markets.description: Popular area for traditional textiles and local jewelry.

markets.name: Bada Bazaar
markets.description: Historic market area known for traditional Ujjaini crafts and religious items.

heritage.name: Mahakaleshwar Jyotirlinga
heritage.description: One of the twelve most sacred Jyotirlingas, famous for its Bhasma Aarti.

heritage.name: Kal Bhairav Temple
heritage.description: Ancient temple where liquor is offered to the deity as part of the ritual.

heritage.name: Ram Ghat
heritage.description: Historic bathing ghat on the Shipra River, central to the Kumbh Mela.

heritage.name: Ved Shala (Jantar Mantar)
heritage.description: Astronomical observatory built by Maharaja Jai Singh II in 1725.

food.name: Ujjaini Namkeen Stalls
food.description: Famous for spicy local snacks like sev and kachoris near the temple area.

food.name: Shiv Sagar Restaurant
food.description: Popular spot for authentic Malwi cuisine and thalis.

food.name: Kulfi Stalls at Tower Chowk
food.description: Traditional dessert spots frequented by locals.

nature.name: Shipra River Bank
nature.description: Sacred river offering peaceful views and ritualistic experiences (Ghats).

nature.name: Vikram Vatika
nature.description: Lush garden and park dedicated to the legendary King Vikramaditya.

nature.name: Siddhavat
nature.description: Sacred Banyan tree on the banks of the Shipra, believed to be thousands of years old.

entertainment.name: Simhastha Grounds
entertainment.description: Open area where the massive Kumbh Mela congregation takes place every 12 years.

entertainment.name: Triveni Museum
entertainment.description: Art and archaeology museum showcasing the religious heritage of the city.

entertainment.name: Kalidas Academy
entertainment.description: Center for classical theatre and traditional performing arts.
